# Distribution
```{r}
# Normal
mean_val <- 0
sd_val <- 1
dnorm(0, mean_val, sd_val)  # Probability density
pnorm(0, mean_val, sd_val)  # Cumlative distribution
qnorm(0.5, mean_val, sd_val)  # Quantile function
rnorm(2, mean_val, sd_val)  # Random number generation

# Poisson
lambda_val = 2
rpois(2, lambda_val)

# Binomial
size_val = 10
prob_val = 0.3
rbinom(10, size_val, prob_val)
```

# Seed
```{r}
# Set seed
rnorm(2)
set.seed(0)
rnorm(2)
set.seed(0)
rnorm(2)
```

# Sample
```{r}
x <- 1:10
sample(x, 4)
sample(x, 4, replace=TRUE)
```
